pages.text: It can be tricky to bring maids with you while traveling long distances or through different dimensions. Enter Aya's Camera, which is a simple solution to this problem. $(br2)Taking a photo of your maid using this camera will "seal" your maid into that photo; you can release your maid from the photo by right-clicking at the desired destination.
If you have an Album with you, newly taken pictures will be added directly into the Album. Right-clicking the album will release the maids on a first in first out basis.
